title: Bug 49143Possible incorrect lazy initialisations
description: Incorrect lazy initialization of static field:org.apache.catalina.realm.RealmBase.md5Helperorg.apache.catalina.session.StandardSession.sessionContextorg.apache.catalina.startup.TldConfig.noTldJarsorg.apache.catalina.util.ExtensionValidator.containerAvailableExtensionsorg.apache.tomcat.util.modeler.modules.MbeansDescriptorsDigesterSource.digesterfields should probably all be made volatile
